'''Greg''' is the friend of [[Keith Hitchens]].

==History==
Greg came into the ER with his friend, Keith, after he was injured in a trampling at a convention.

Keith had injured his spine and his ear had been ripped off. He had to be taken into surgery to repair damage to his spine because he couldn't feel his feet. After surgery, he became angry at Greg and lashed out, potentially re-injuring his spine.

==Relationships==
===Friendships===
Greg came into the ER with his friend, Keith. Greg went back to the convention center and stayed there all night to find his ear, which he then brought back to the hospital so it could be re-attached. Greg also sold the TARDIS he'd gotten to help pay for Keith's medical bills.

==Notes and Trivia==
*He sold the TARDIS for $7,500.
